body: Photos & Multimedia                         President Obama Designates Fort Monroe President Obama signs a declaration to declare Fort Monroe in Hampton, Virginia, as a national monument.   Duration:4 minutes, 38 seconds                 View the 1889 Souvenir Booklet of Old Point Comfort (Library of Congress).                    Fort Monroe   15 Photos  Photographs of Fort Monroe National Monument
title: Fort Monroe National Monument: Photos & Multimedia
